meta.content: Jeopardy Archive A.J. Motley Lynn Welch Prabhu Balasubramanian Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6418.

td.p: A.J. Motley, a student of diagnostic sonography from Wylie, Texas
Lynn Welch, a pharmacist from Evanston, Illinois
Prabhu Balasubramanian, a product manager from Mountain View, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,199)

tr.td: BABY, YOU'RE A RICH MAN OR WOMAN
ABBREVIATED BANDS
INTERNATIONALITIES
(Alex: Each correct response will contain the name of a nationality.)
FAST FOOD
"F"-STOPS

Prabhu
Lynn
A.J.

New champion: $20,801

Lynn
A.J.
